quiz.name: Do you feel physically attractive?
quiz.quiz_phases:
false eating,healthy,body,weight,foods,issues,diet,emotional,energy,eat,vegetables,nutrients,fruits,overweight,food,underweight,diets,nutritious,pounds Mon Oct 13 01:47:44 UTC 2008 1 First 1 1 Mon Feb 09 04:31:45 UTC 2009 true Tue Oct 07 00:24:47 UTC 2008 1 1 1. Are you within 10 pounds of a healthy body weight? 1 Mon Feb 09 04:28:42 UTC 2009 true Yes Tue Oct 07 00:26:54 UTC 2008 1 1 1 Thu Feb 05 22:54:25 UTC 2009 230 true

Good job keeping your weight where you want it. That’s not easy. If you manage your weight with a healthy, well-balanced diet—particularly if it’s rich in fresh vegetables, fruits, and other whole foods—you should feel very good about yourself. But if you keep your weight down with less-than-ideal eating habits, you may compromise your health by missing nutrients your body needs.

Whatever your eating habits, most of us can do a little better by learning more about healthy nutrition, addressing issues that cause us to eat poorly, or finding ways to be less rigid about eating perfectly.

The Personalized Plan you receive when you join the MaxWell Daily Club will include ideas for healthy eating to satisfy your body, mind, and spirit.
